title: Fin & Friends
imgSmText: Underwater fish adventure with many challanges and wonders.
imgText: A group of playful fish navigates coral reefs, facing challenges, discovering friendship, and learning about all the wonders of the ocean.

title: Deep Sea Tales
imgSmText: Ocean fish exploration to find treasures beyond sea life.
imgText: Fish of all kinds explore a sunken ship and uncover hidden treasures while learning teamwork and courage.

title: Jungle Jamboree
imgSmText: Animated jungle animals save their home from threats.
imgText: A lively jungle adventure where animals team up to save their home from an unexpected threat.

title: Tiny Fixers
imgSmText: Miniature humans repair things and face hilarious obstacles.
imgText: Tiny humans live inside a house, repairing everyday objects while navigating hilarious obstacles and household dangers.

title: Star Teleporters
imgSmText: Space adventure with stars and magic and bend reality in its finest.
imgText: Humans gain the ability to teleport through stars, leading to cosmic adventures across the galaxy and meeting alien friends.

title: Horse School
imgSmText: Horse attends school and falls in love with the wonders of education
imgText: A young horse attends a special school for magical animals, learning about friendship, courage, and the magic of education.

title: Love Bloom
imgSmText: Flower falls for bee and together they explore the world.
imgText: A flower experiences an existential crisis but finds love and meaning when a curious bee enters its life.

title: Racing Wheels
imgSmText: Animated cars race and explore more than just race tracks.
imgText: A high-energy car racing adventure filled with friendship, rivalries, and thrilling stunts on tracks around the world.

title: Global Tracks
imgSmText: Trains around the world operate every day connecting people and landscapes.
imgText: An epic journey follows trains traveling across continents, connecting people, cultures, and landscapes in exciting adventures.

title: Feathered Friends
imgSmText: Birds on adventure facing challenges similar to humans but very different as well.
imgText: A flock of birds embarks on a journey, learning about teamwork, courage, and discovering hidden lands from above.

title: Ocean Buddies
imgSmText: Underwater friendship with the power to move earths.
imgText: Two fish from different backgrounds form an unlikely friendship while exploring sunken treasures and ocean mysteries.

title: Jungle Rescue
imgSmText: Jungle animals save forest and their home against unwanted threats.
imgText: A group of jungle animals comes together to protect their forest from environmental threats and human interference.

title: Tiny Mechanics
imgSmText: Miniature repair team care for their surroundings with discipline and heart.
imgText: Miniature humans navigate a world of giant objects, repairing broken toys and household items with inventive solutions.

title: Star Jumpers
imgSmText: Space teleportation fun with many surprising twists.
imgText: A group of children gains star-jumping abilities, traveling to distant planets while learning teamwork and problem-solving.

title: Train Adventures
imgSmText: Trains worldwide and threats that could harm their operation.
imgText: Animated trains travel across deserts, mountains, and cities, connecting characters and stories in a lively global adventure.

title: Coral & the Current
imgSmText: A timid clownfish must deliver a crucial message across the reef.
imgText: Coral is the reef's worst swimmer, but when the current carrying vital nutrients stops, she must journey to the legendary source to save her home, making unlikely friends.

title: Finley's Fable
imgSmText: A boastful lionfish learns humility after getting lost in the deep.
imgText: Finley's arrogance gets him swept into the terrifying deep sea. To find his way home, he must rely on the strange and wonderful creatures he once mocked.

title: Vine
imgSmText: A clumsy sloth must save his jungle canopy home from a silent threat.
imgText: When a strange vine begins to smother the jungle, a sloth named Bongo is the only one slow enough to notice. He must find his courage to rally the faster animals.

title: The Fix-Its
imgSmText: Tiny repair people secretly maintain our world from inside the walls.
imgText: Beneath our notice, the Fix-Its keep civilization running. When a giant toy factory breaks down, a young Fix-It must lead a team to fix it before it's discovered.

title: Starlight Express
imgSmText: A lonely star grants a boy's wish to travel the galaxy.
imgText: A boy who dreams of space is visited by a mischievous young star. They embark on a magical tour of the cosmos, learning about friendship and the beauty of home.

title: Horseplay
imgSmText: A horse disguised as a student brings chaos to a human elementary school.
imgText: A curious young horse uses a magical amulet to turn into a boy to experience school. He must keep his secret while dealing with homework, soccer, and the call of the wild.

title: Bloom
imgSmText: A pessimistic flower falls for a bee who shows her the beauty of life.
imgText: Bloom believes her purpose is pointless. But a persistent, optimistic bee shows her how vital she is to the world, helping her find joy and love in her existence.

title: Zoom Sapiens
imgSmText: In a world of sentient cars, a slow vintage model wins the big race.
imgText: In a city ruled by fast cars, a kind but slow vintage couper is laughed at. He enters the Grand Prix to prove that heart and cleverness are more important than speed.

title: Global Choo-Choo
imgSmText: Trains from every culture race on a track that spans the whole world.
imgText: Trains from every corner of the globe compete in a friendly race to see who is the fastest, strongest, and most resilient on a track that connects all seven continents.

title: Aviary High
imgSmText: A bird who's afraid of flying must compete in the school migration.
imgText: Every bird at Aviary High must pass the migration exam. But Piper has a secret:, she's terrified of heights. She must conquer her fear to graduate with her friends.

title: Parcel Force
imgSmText: A magical package delivery service run by dragons.
imgText: When a dragon fails at breathing fire, she's assigned to the Parcel Force. She discovers her unique talent for delivery, bringing joy to the kingdom one package at a time.

title: The Last Snowflake
imgSmText: A young snowflake doesn't want to melt and journeys to find a cold place.
imgText: The last snowflake of winter refuses to melt. He embarks on an epic journey to the North Pole, meeting other seasonal spirits who help him find where he belongs.

title: Noodle Bowl
imgSmText: A ramen noodle comes to life in a kitchen and seeks adventure.
imgText: A single ramen noodle springs to life and explores the vast, dangerous kitchen, making friends with other food items while avoiding the hungry humans.

title: The Quiet Knight
imgSmText: A mouse must become a knight to save her castle from a terrible... kitten.
imgText: In a castle's walls, a quiet mouse must embody the legends of knightly courage to protect her community from a fearsome beast that has invaded: a house cat.

title: Melody's Dinosaur
imgSmText: A girl's drawing of a dinosaur comes to life as her imaginary friend.
imgText: A lonely girl's drawing magically comes to life. Her friendly dinosaur companion helps her navigate the challenges of moving to a new town and making new friends.
